# Executable names:
EXE = final_project
TEST = test

# Add all object files needed for compiling:
EXE_OBJ = main.o
OBJS = flight.o graph.o main.o

# Generated files
CLEAN_RM = out.png 

# Use the standard cs225 makefile template:
include cs225/make/cs225.mk

# MP-specific target
# Testing main.cpp
MAIN_OBJS = testmain.o
MAIN_OBJS = main.o
testmain.o: $(MAIN_OBJS)
	$(LD) $^ $(LDFLAGS) -o $@

# Testing flight.cpp 
FLIGHT_OBJS = testflight.o
FLIGHT_OBJS = flight.o
testflight.o: $(FLIGHT_OBJS)
	$(LD) $^ $(LDFLAGS) -o $@

# Testing graph.cpp
GRAPH_OBJS = testgraph.o
GRAPH_OBJS += graph.o
testgraph.o: $(GRAPH_OBJS)
	$(LD) $^ $(LDFLAGS) -o $@
